## ContextInspectOptions interface

Options for context.inspect()

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [includeParent](./context.contextinspectoptions.includeparent.md) | <code>boolean</code> | The flag to control if parent context should be inspected |
